## Concern

Describe your security concern or potential misuse scenario.

## Suggested Mitigation

If you have ideas for how to address this concern, please share them.

## Urgency

- [ ] Low - General concern
- [ ] Medium - Potential for misuse
- [ ] High - Active misuse observed
